summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Radio Directory App MVP. Fixed critical CSS compilation issue preventing frontend from loading. All major features tested and working: search, browse by genre/country, audio player, favorites, volume control.
passed_tests: Backend API endpoints (100% success rate - 12/12 tests passed)
Home page loads with top stations and trending sections
Search functionality - search by station name (BBC search returned 50 results)
Browse by genre - genre tags clickable and navigation working
Browse by country - country tags clickable and navigation working
Play station - click on station card starts audio playback
Player bar appears when station is playing with correct station info
Add to favorites - heart icon functionality working
Favorites page shows saved stations (1 station saved and displayed)
Volume control works - mute/unmute button and volume slider functional
Play/pause controls working in player bar
